---
title: Brand YAML Python Package
---

## Installation

### From PyPI

```bash
uv pip install brand_yaml
```

### From GitHub

```bash
uv pip install "git+https://github.com/posit-dev/brand-yaml#subdirectory=pkg-py"
```

## Example

```{python}
from brand_yaml import Brand

brand = Brand.from_yaml_str(
    """
    meta:
      name: Posit Software, PBC
      link: https://posit.co
    color:
      primary: "#447099"
      secondary: "#707073"
      success: "#72994E"
      info: "#419599"
      warning: "#EE6331"
      danger: "#9A4665"
    typography:
      base: 
        family: Open Sans
        weight: 300
    """
)
```

```{python}
brand.meta.name
```

```{python}
brand.color.primary
```

```{python}
brand.typography.base.model_dump()
```
